data.message: Okay, now go rap like that in the booth instead of that double time, shouty stuff you're doing now please. That sounded awesome

replies.message: He was spittin a verse from 50.. on the 8 mile soundtrack..i got places to go is the name of the track
Yeah mate, I know. It's just been a while since em sounded that smooth on a record in my opinion lol
Right..i wanna see him do a album just callin out names and destroys everyone in the game today
Joseph Lujan  he's into just showing why he's the goat now, figured out the science of words, but i hope he end someone career and beef again.
...yes Joseph! And get Kung Fu Kenny on that
Stanley Marsh he did a collab with k dot would like to see another though
I was disappointed with love game tbh. Kendrick killed it tho
He's supposedly gonna release a album by the end of this year
His verse on speedom was him. He didn't need to double time it. If his next album is anything like mmlp2 and it has tech n9ne on the track it's gonna go diamond within 6 months.

I want to hear a him do an album like his first few. Even though not broke, I loved the struggle and gutter stories of his life. The picture he painted was new to industry. Also motivational and most people in poverty could relate which is why he took off the way he did. The being great with words is just a small part to why he got as big as he did. Dude has helped out so many people in dark times.
